I closed that account in 2022 but someone gained access to it by pretending to be me and changed the password and email address in order to use it for their own purposes. In fact, there are at 3 or 4 alien Facebook accounts that were cloned in my name. All of these accounts in the name of Kathleen Lyles should be shut down and removed from Facebook.

reviews.title: Evil incarnate and totally insecure
reviews.content:
Facebook has been found in violation of so many privacy laws that nobody should use this app. They mine your data, analyze your every interaction then sell it to others. Sure, you may think all apps do this but Facebook started it and they are the worst about it. They control elections and censor content. The app itself is running about 70 percent ad content and the only people left on this dying platform are old people who have no other way to reach their old friends.

reviews.title: From bad to worse to total garbage
reviews.content: I no longer use the app anymore due to the fact that I got sick of having ads every 10 seconds of any video I watched, not to mention that I had more ads showing up on my feed than I did posts from my friends. I also have been unable to see the most recent things my friends post without going to their page. That being said, after one of the most recent updates, feeds no longer load properly, and 90% of the time my feed and videos no longer load. You’re going downhill Facebook, only a matter of time before you go under. No customer support, hackers everywhere, more compromised accounts than not. Facebook has no support for people who’s accounts have been hacked, and when you report the hacked accounts, they tell you there’s nothing wrong with it. Never seen a more poorly run company in my life.

reviews.author: Zoey Settipane

reviews.title: Blatantly Islamophobic and Fascist
reviews.content:
This app intentionally suppresses information, specifically in regard to the Palestinian people in Gaza right now. At times, comments in Arabic are automatically flagged and “hidden by Instagram” when they are literally just prayers. The content put out by social justice activists and advocates are intentionally suppressed and shadow banned in the algorithm. When I repeat similar phrases on completely different posts (the comments are not nearly identical or the same exactly, just similar) the comment is instantly removed as spam, so evidently their AI has placed a target on my back, and flags comments for anything relating to what I’ve said before. I’ve had Instagram intentionally try to deter me from spreading information about the realities of what’s going on, and it has basically harassed me with popups saying I’m “posting” too often. Like is this a social media app or is it the thought police? Which are you, Instagram? Meta? Whatever your stupid name is these days. Why don’t you try a different kind of rebrand? Perhaps one that involves actual free speech? 

Shameful. You all ought to be ashamed in the role you’re playing in the murder of these people, and the censorship of the truth. SHAME ON YOU. And your app is trash.

reviews.title: Changes not for the better
reviews.content: I’ve been using Instagram since 5th grade so almost 10 years now and I absolutely loved instagram. It has been my primary social media and content consumption app for years. However, I have neither enjoyed nor appreciated a lot of the new updates. Especially the new Ai. Look i’m all for innovation but the way meta has been integrated to the user interface makes me want to rip my hair out. It keeps getting in the way and popping up when i try to search ya know, actual instagram. If i wanted to Ai generate images I would go to an Ai platform there’s just not need for it in Instagram. I also don’t understand why they changed how to view multi photo posts. The white dots were fine. This new tiny sliver of the next picture thing is both ugly and more confusing than just a bunch of dots in the bottom. The fact that instagram has not listened nor conducted user surveys before or after implementing these changes says a lot about the company and i am disappointed in what the app has become. These changes don’t make me want to recommend nor continuing using Instagram. I hope in the future they conduct more user testing and maybe use their brains for half a second before implementing useless changes to a once great app.

reviews.author: Wash hts gangster

reviews.title: The removal of “recent posts” under hashtags
reviews.content:
The removal of “recent posts” under hashtags has been incredibly frustrating. On top of the obnoxious AI, the explore page and search bar has become both useless and unusable. When I finally fight the AI’s suggestions to “plan a historical trip” and view the hashtag I want to look at, it’s filled with top posts from popular accounts. It’s near impossible (without spending unreasonable amounts of time), to find any smaller creators or recent posts. What’s the point of a hashtag if people can’t view the content that’s *actively* being posted under it? This stifles and chance of small accounts being recognized and just encourages uniformity and unoriginal content. Everyone is forced to adopt what’s trendy because that’s the only way to pop up on explore. 

Instagram, like all social medias, has a history of awful choices aimed at manipulating people as much as possible and it’s getting harder and harder to care about these apps. I’m forced to use it for business purposes but have given up on personal use.
reviews.author: The Photobomber

reviews.title: Discriminating censorship with no recourse
reviews.content: I love the app, but once you have your Contant removed for whatever reason, the automated system chooses from that point on almost everything you post gets removed. I just keep having comments about the Mets and Rangers removed all the time and other comments as well that have no foul language obscenities, social or political agendas or anything like that yet they still removed, and there is no way to contact them to ask why. Then after every that are removed, even though they should not be you get suspended for a few days and there is no one to about it. They talk about free speech, but it is certainly nonexistent here on Instagram, which is a shame. Once in a while, there will be a button that says you can request a review which will come a few months later with just a denial and no to speak on your behalf to ask what exactly the comment was removed for. They pretty much have close to a monopoly on this type of platform, but once more options appear, I guess I will have to consider

reviews.author: Angelface_0121

reviews.title: META AI is awful
reviews.content:
I used META AI to write this review:

Here's a review:

Title: A Nightmare Invasion of Privacy - Instagram/Meta's AI Falls Flat

I'm extremely disappointed and concerned with Instagram/Meta's new AI feature. Instead of enhancing my experience, it's made my time on the app a constant frustration. The AI constantly interrupts my scrolling with invasive and irrelevant suggestions, making it feel like a nagging salesperson who won't take no for an answer.

But that's not even the worst part - the AI seems to be constantly monitoring and analyzing my every move, making me feel like I'm under surveillance. It's creepy and uncomfortable, and I feel like my privacy is being violated at every turn.

The final straw is that the AI is just plain bad at its job. The suggestions are often completely off-base, and the "recommended" accounts it pushes on me are either spammy or completely unrelated to my interests.

Overall, Instagram/Meta's new AI feature is a disaster. It's invasive, annoying, and just plain terrible. I implore the developers to go back to the drawing board and rethink their approach - because this AI is a total waste of space.

Rating: 1/5 stars (and that's being generous)

And it hit the nail on the head.

reviews.author: Giannaliciois

reviews.title: WANT NOW🌮🌮
reviews.content: This app has made me aware of many things & capable of many things! We are able to communicate with who we appreciate or who we are close to, share to be felt, like to express what we love, post to be seen/be recognized & received, follow because there are mutual interests or family/friends, spread emotions with no filter sadness, happiness, disappointment, neutrality (in love & war) and most commonly, anger! We are able to be friend or foe or none, even in opinion - disagree or agree or none, maybe both! The ability to hate or love! Emotions are so raw & honest, that they will make you feel - especially in the reels! There, it has made me realize too that I may not be the smartest but I’m definitely not the stupidest, but I am just one person of these many users, oh how smart we are in our own ways it’s truly astonishing! Being unwilling to learn is very detrimental to the growth of our self reflection, no matter where we are or who we are, you can be assured to learn things here especially about people’s character, whether it benefits you or the opposite. Coming into this app you have to remember no one can make YOU be you, you are YOUER than you, that’s what YOU choose so don’t choose to be like them! Whether your experience is dissatisfying, relieving or golden, it all counts because all days are not the same, there will be some that make you feel love & some even hate. 😇🤍

reviews.content:
The app has been nothing but problematic since I started an account in Dec 2023. I keep getting prevented from commenting, liking and following.

Currently I can’t do any of the above for a week. I got a message saying I’m using a third party app which I’m NOT. I’m just a person trying to be social and engage, on a SOCIAL ENGAGEMENT APP. 

It’s gotten beyond ridiculous.

reviews.title: Stop letting the app turn my sound up after I turn it off!
reviews.content:
The app is great but the fact that it can turn the sound up after you've manually turned off sound on your phone is unacceptable.

 It turned on when I was rocking my baby to sleep after I deliberately turned it off. What happens if I'm in public, or in the bathroom?!? It should not over ride my preferences. This feature is so not cool, it's gotta go or it's gonna get deleted.
